Quality_text: Zamil Food Industry signifies the on-going process in planning, monitoring, and producing superior quality of foods. To maintain this process, we monitor and optimize the tasks and activities at hand. Using modern approaches with the latest technology. Loyalty to the rules and regulations, it has been a top priority to make sure that our products are from the finest of quality.Halal food is all what we offer to our clients. From production line, to packing and storage, and onto shipping, we make sure to meet our client’s every need and provide assurance that the service and food quality will be maintained at all times.Zamil Food Industry is ISO 22000 & BRC certified. Our factory is designed and equipped according to Quality and Food safety International standards, and awarded by the SFDA accordingly.

About_zamil: Zamil Food Industries is a Saudi company with diverse interests and capabilities. The value we bring includes management expertise and accumulated operational competence.
our_vision: To be one of the top food manufacturing companies.To be pioneers in food industries. Provide high-quality products and innovative solutions.
our_values: Delivering high-quality products and services through excellence in performance. We will achieve this through continues commitment to excel, skilled workforce, and the adaptation of leading technologies.
our_mission:
Innovation and Excellence 

 We embrace positive change brought forth by Innovation and Aspirations to grow our business. We ensure that our customers' needs are met through the provision of high quality products and services.Set up plans, programs and performance evaluation to achieve excellence.

Leadership and Community.

 We strive to develop our business through the optimal use of resources and technologies. Achieving success, and participating in society through interaction with community members. Encourage and support staff initiatives.

Integrity   

We are committed to honesty and integrity in our business.Taking into account ethical manners and principles.
